Title: Authorizes insurers to allow the insured to take and submit photographs of their automobile for purposes of the issuance or renewal of a policy of automobile physical damage insurance
Summary: Authorizes insurers to allow the insured to take and submit photographs of their automobile for purposes of the issuance or renewal of a policy of automobile physical damage insurance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to submission by an insured of vehicle photographs for purposes of the issuance or renewal of a policy of automobile physical damage insurance
